speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Marios Matsakis, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Community strategy concerning mercury ( 2005/2050(INI) ) ( A6-0044/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Marios Matsakis, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Community strategy concerning mercury ( 2005/2050(INI) ) ( A6-0044/2006 ).
